english.segment1: I took the long long way to help you. I never took my eyes off the trail. I never say goodbye so I ask myself why. this is what I got in the mail
english.segment2: I took the long long way to stop you. I never thought that you'd really fail. we never said goodbye so I'm asking you why. this is what I got in the mail
english.segment3: the golden lights. I love you still
english.segment4: I took the long long way to help you. I never took my eyes off your trail. I never say goodbye so I ask myself why. this is what I got in the mail
english.segment5: the golden lights. I love you still
